entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
